A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A bloated\, unsatisfying mess.  Lazy storytelling\, which basically abandons the narrative threads established in TFA without replacing them with anything meaningful.  This is not how a trilogy works.  Moreover\, RJ's efforts to \"remake\" certain essential elements of the Star Wars universe does a total disservice to the fans - and their children - who have invested in this universe for decades.  And don't get me started on the Leia in space scene....
